job_description: • Trim BuyerlocationsNovi, Michigan, USposted onPosted 16 Days AgoR00206641Production OperatorlocationsShelby Twp, Michigan, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00166815Production OperatorlocationsExcelsior Springs, Missouri, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00165853Production Operator - 2nd shiftlocationsLancaster, Ohio, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00201393Production Operator - 1st shiftlocationsLancaster, Ohio, USposted onPosted 30 Days AgoR00204390Production Operator - 3rd shiftlocationsLancaster, Ohio, USposted onPosted 30 Days AgoR00203988Materials Supervisor- 2nd shiftlocationsSpring Hill, Tennessee, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00200154Assembly OperatorlocationsMoore, South Carolina, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00192265Material HandlerlocationsMoore, South Carolina, USposted onPosted 30+ Days AgoR00193687Production Assembler (Temporary Positions)locationsShepherdsville, Kentucky, USposted onPosted YesterdayR00209345Specialist, Health & SafetylocationsShelby Twp, Michigan, USposted onPosted 23 Days AgoR00169507Trim Commodity ManagerlocationsNovi, Michigan, USposted onPosted 16 Days AgoR00203535Plastics Commodity ManagerlocationsNovi, Michigan, USposted onPosted 8 Days AgoR00207824.

• Have deep experience building and shipping real-time perception for robots, mobile platforms, or edge devices.
• Are skilled in deploying and optimizing ML models on resource-constrained devices.
• Experience with depth/ranging modalities (stereo, ToF, LiDAR, structured light) and uncertainty-aware fusion.
• Experience designing for robustness in challenging conditions (motion blur, HDR/low light, occlusion, sensor faults).
• Design and implement perception pipelines for detection, tracking, segmentation, depth/optical flow, and scene understanding.
• Build robust sensor ingest systems including camera capture, IMU/time sync, buffering, and zero-copy data paths.
• Calibrate and fuse multimodal sensors (intrinsics, extrinsics, temporal sync) and implement state estimation (EKF/UKF, VIO/SLAM).
• Optimize on-device inference and vision kernels across CPU/GPU/NPU/ISP, with attention to quantization, compilation, and scheduling under power/thermal limits.
